TitlePage.Title: &KBMAG;
TitlePage.Subtitle: Knuth--Bendix on Monoids, and Automatic Groups
TitlePage.Author:
Derek Holt
Mathematics Institute
University of Warwick, Coventry, CV4 7AL
TitlePage.Abstract:
The &KBMAG; package for &GAP;4 provides an interface to some `C' programs for running the Knuth-Bendix completion program on finite semigroup, monoid or group presentations, and for attempting to compute automatic structures of finitely presented groups.
The latest version is &KBMAGVERSION; of &KBMAGLONGRELEASEDATE;.
Bug reports, comments, suggestions for additional features, and offers to implement some of these, will all be very welcome.
Please submit any issues at http://github.com/gap-packages/kbmag/issues/.
